trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for selecting an image for a property in a property grid.
An <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that provides a user interface for the user to select an image for a property.
When the user starts the editor, it displays an **Open File** dialog box that enables the user to navigate to a directory and select a file.
The file list is initially filtered by the default file name extensions for the editor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor"></xref> class.
Creates a string of file name extensions using the specified array of file extensions and the specified separator.
The specified extensions indicate the file types for the open file dialog box to filter the file list for by default.
The extensions to filter for.
The separator to use.
A string containing the specified file name extensions, each separated by the specified separator.
Creates a filter entry for a file dialog box's file list.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor"></xref> to get the filter entry from.
The new filter entry string.
Edits the specified object value using the edit style provided by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)"></xref> method.
This editor uses a service provider to obtain any necessary editing services.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> through which editing services can be obtained.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> being edited.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the new value.

If the value of the object has not changed, <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)"></xref> returns the object that was passed to it.
Gets the editing style of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)"></xref> method.
If the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue%2A> method is not supported, this method will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> values indicating the supported editing style.
Gets the extensions for the file-list filter that this editor initially uses to filter the file list.
A set of file extensions used to filter the file list.
Gets the description for the default file-list filter provided by this editor.
The file dialog box description appears in the file-list filter drop-down list box.
The description for the default file-list filter.
Gets an array of supported image types.
An array of <xref href="System.Type"></xref> representing supported image types.
Gets a value indicating whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
`true` if <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.PaintValue(System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs)"></xref> is implemented; otherwise, `false`.
Loads an image from the specified stream.
A <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> that contains the image to load.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that has been loaded.
Paints a value indicated by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref>.

To display the representation of the value in a typical property sheet format, paint within the boundaries of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> contained within the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref> indicating what to paint and where to paint it.
